title: Why Must He Continue To Text Other Women
itunes:title: Why Must He Continue To Text Other Women
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been with my husband for 6 years and we’ve been married for 2 years. I have myself to blame for what I’m going through now, because it was an issue before we got married. My husband has a problem with texting and talking to other females. When I’ve addressed the issue with him, he always says “Nothing is wrong with texting and talking, as long as I’m not crossing the line or trying to date anybody.” I believe that if one of the women he talks to or texts comes on to him, that he will take them up on the offer..............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
